meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7536.

td.p: Tanya Obreiter, a cell biologist from Frederick, Maryland
Justin Braddock, a power engineer from Chattanooga, Tennessee
Ragavan Ramsubramani, a financial analyst from New York, New York (whose 3-day cash winnings total $54,603)

tr.td: DGA FEATURE FILM AWARD WINNERS
THUNDER & LIGHTNING
BOOKS
WORDS WITH SILENT LETTERS
BEERS BY STATE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_6_5', 'clue_J_6_5_stuck', '(Heather Tom and Thorsten Kaye give the clue as Katie and Ridge from The Bold and the Beautiful.) "Ridge, why are you still concealing the truth?" "Because, Katie, it is our secret to reveal, no one else\'s. & I\'ll stand behind that like Leonidas & his 300 men at this famous mountain pass in the 5th century B.C."')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Heather Tom and Thorsten Kaye give the clue as Katie and Ridge from The Bold and the Beautiful.) "Ridge, why are you still concealing the truth?" "Because, Katie, it is our secret to reveal, no one else's. & I'll stand behind that like Leonidas & his 300 men at this famous mountain pass in the 5th century B.C."

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
